description: The remove-vendor merge has broken linux_net.py, by changing "import nova.utils" into "from nova import utils" without changing the places where nova.utils was referenced.
title: All network actions fail with NameError

comments.content: The remove-vendor merge has broken linux_net.py, by changing "import nova.utils" into "from nova import utils" without changing the places where nova.utils was referenced.
